settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.heading: Detail
settings.content:
Transformers Action Edition 01 - G1 Optimus Prime from Blokees offers an officially licensed, highly detailed figure that brings the iconic leader to life. Standing at 18cm tall, G1 Optimus Prime provides a more commanding presence. With 45 movable joints and a mechanical skeleton, it allows for precise and dynamic posing. Additionally, G1 Optimus Prime consists of 188 pieces, making it more intricate and complex to assemble, ensuring a satisfying and detailed building experience.

The magnetic light module enhances the figure with glowing eyes and a removable Matrix of Leadership. Rich accessories and weapons, including a jet pack, laser cannon, and energon axe, provide endless display possibilities. Designed for easy assembly, this figure ensures a hassle-free setup, making it the perfect addition to any Transformers collection.

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules: 

1. For individuals aged 10 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 10 are not advised to make purchases. 

2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys. 

3. Suprise products are unique and random; once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
• G1 Optimus Prime Figure x 1
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture
  • Display Stand x 1
  • Stickers x 1
  • Instruction Manual x 1

settings.block_text: This officially licensed figure from Blokees faithfully captures G1 Optimus Prime's iconic design from the classic series Generation 1, ensuring authenticity and high-quality craftsmanship for collectors and fans alike.
With 45 points of articulation and a precisely engineered mechanical skeleton, this figure allows you to recreate classic poses with superior mobility and detailed internal structure.

Featuring a state-of-the-art magnetic light module, the Blokees Action Edition G1 Optimus Prime brings your figure to life with stunning visual effects. Unlike previous models that required shaking to activate the lights, this innovative design uses a magnetic trigger. When a magnetic piece is brought close to the light module, it activates, causing the eyes to glow and illuminating the removable Matrix of Leadership. This dynamic feature not only enhances the visual appeal but also adds an engaging, interactive element to your display.

Complete with a jet pack, laser cannon, energon axe, holomatter avatar, communicator, and articulated hands, this figure offers a wide array of accessories to recreate epic battle scenes and iconic moments.
With 188 pieces, this figure provides a detailed and intricate assembly experience. Despite its complexity, the assembly is designed to be straightforward, ensuring a smooth and satisfying setup.

settings.heading: The Most Posable G1 Optimus Prime Ever: Authentic G1 Action!
settings.context: This officially licensed G1 Optimus Prime figure sets a new standard with 45 points of articulation, light-up features, and a full arsenal of weapons. Build epic poses, recreate your favorite scenes, and experience the power of the Autobots like never before!

settings.block_line_left_gorw_content: Integrated Design: The standard body serves as the foundation, using a mechanical skeleton to support both the internal structure and external armor, ensuring stability and flexibility.
settings.block_line_right_gorw_content: These components form the "flesh" of the figure, meticulously replicating the character's internal mechanical structure for added realism and functionality.
settings.block_lins_left_content: The external armor integrates seamlessly with the mechanical skeleton, allowing for greater range of motion with auto-adjusting shoulder armor.
settings.block_lins_right_content: The external armor features multi-layered paintwork to restore classic colors accurately.

settings.title_line_text: Gear Up for Battle: Blokees Action Edition G1 Optimus Prime Add-Ons
settings.title_line_content: Classic Weapons and Custom Features for the Ultimate G1 Optimus Prime Experience
settings.grop_left_top_content: Multiple points of articulation allow for dynamic and expressive poses.
settings.grop_right_top_content: Swap out hands for various poses, including pointing, fists, and weapon grips.
settings.center_line_content: Transform your G1 Optimus Prime into a "toy colors" version by swapping parts and applying the included stickers. Use optional parts and stickers to personalize your figure and add a unique touch to your collection.
settings.bottom_line_left_top_content: The chest window can be manually opened to reveal and remove the iconic Matrix of Leadership.
settings.bottom_line_bottom_content: Removable Matrix of Leadership: Open the chest window and remove the Matrix.
settings.bottom_line_right_top_content: A dedicated base for the figure, perfect for showcasing G1 Optimus Prime in dynamic battle poses.

settings.context2: With 9 iconic characters, each featuring stunning paint details and intricate designs, this series takes your collection to the next level. The special figure in this series is an edition with a metallic paint finish, offering more detailed spray paint and refined printing for an extraordinary collectible.
settings.context3:
The special figure in this series is produced in a ratio of 1:36.
1/36 means that for every 36 Transformers produced, there is 1 special figure.

settings.block_text: Designed for ages 14 and up, this figure ensures safety and enjoyment for older children and collectors alike.
Assembly of the figure encourages problem-solving and fine motor skills, making it both fun and educational.
Ideal for birthdays and special occasions, this figure is the ultimate gift for Transformers enthusiasts.
Made from durable ABS and PCBA, ensuring the figure withstands play and display wear and tear.
Features light-up effects, multiple accessories, and interchangeable parts for an interactive and immersive play experience.
Includes unique items like stickers and a display stand to enhance the overall collector’s experience.
Designed for straightforward assembly, making it accessible and enjoyable for all skill levels.
Faithfully captures the iconic look of G1 Optimus Prime, appealing to both long-time fans and new collectors.

settings.title: Prime Fanatic
settings.context: "This figure has exceeded all my expectations. The intricate paintwork and rich accessories like the jet pack and energon axe are fantastic. Easy to assemble and looks stunning on display. Highly recommend!"

settings.context: "Owning this figure feels like being a kid again. Attention to detail and classic design are spot on. The magnetic light module and removable Matrix of Leadership are amazing touches. A true collector's item!"

settings.title: Quality Seeker
settings.context: "The build quality of this G1 Optimus Prime figure is outstanding. The mechanical skeleton and detailed inner mechanics add so much realism. The accessories are plentiful and well-made. Worth every penny!"

settings.title: Hobbyist Hero
settings.context: "Putting this figure together was a breeze. The instructions were clear, and the parts fit perfectly. The end result is a highly posable, visually stunning G1 Optimus Prime. Perfect addition to my collection."

settings.title: Light Show
settings.context: "The light-up features really make this figure stand out. The glowing eyes and chest, along with the removable Matrix of Leadership, add such a cool dynamic. It's like having a mini movie scene right on my shelf."

settings.block_title: What is the recommended age for the Blokees Action Edition G1 Optimus Prime figure?
settings.block_text: The Blokees Action Edition G1 Optimus Prime figure figure is recommended for ages 14 and up, ensuring it is safe and suitable for older children and collectors.

settings.block_title: What are the dimensions of the packaging?
settings.block_text: The package size for the Blokees G1 Optimus Prime figure is 250mm x 130mm x 320mm, making it compact yet substantial enough to house all its detailed components.
Average delivery time for the Blokees figure is between 2-7 business days, depending on your location and shipping method.

settings.block_title: What accessories are included with the figure?
settings.block_text:
The package includes:
- G1 Optimus Prime Figure x 1
- Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture
- Display Stand x 1
- Stickers x 1
- Instruction Manual x 1

settings.block_title: What materials is the figure made from?
settings.block_text: The Blokees G1 Optimus Prime figure is crafted from high-quality ABS and PCBA materials, ensuring durability and a premium feel. It also includes a battery for the light-up features.

settings.block_title: How many points of articulation does the figure have?
settings.block_text: The Blokees G1 Optimus Prime figure boasts 45 points of articulation, allowing for highly dynamic and precise posing. This includes movable fingers, a mechanical skeleton, and detailed inner mechanics for authentic recreation of classic scenes.

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
